data.title: MMG lawyers main
data.text:
Robert Paessler is a Partner with the firm and one of its principal trial attorneys. He handles complex and catastrophic general liability and medical malpractice matters, for firm clients in federal and state courts in both New York and New Jersey.

EXPERIENCE

Rob has been with McMahon, Martine & Gallagher since the beginning of his legal career in 1995. In 2004 he was made a Partner of the firm. He has extensive experience in successfully representing clients in complex and catastrophic personal injury accident and medical malpractice cases.

​

EDUCATION

Rob earned his Juris Doctorate from Seton Hall University School of Law in 1995. He graduated with his Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics and Marketing from Muhlenberg College in 1991.

BAR ADMISSIONS

U.S. Southern District of New York; U.S. Eastern District of New York; New York State Courts; U.S. District of New Jersey; New Jersey State Courts; and Pennsylvania State Courts; U.S. District Court for Eastern District of Pennsylvania.

​

MEMBERSHIPS

Rob is a founding member of New Jersey Property Loss and Risk Professionals. Rob also is a member of the Defense Association of New York and also the Catholic Lawyers Guild. Member of Temple University School of Podiatric Medicine Risk Assessment Board, Temple University, Philadelphia, Pa.

LANGUAGES
